mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking (bo_num, email_id, ro_type, ac_id, checkin_day, checkout_day, status, payment_code, reg_date) VALUES (#{bo_num}, #{email_id}, #{ro_type}, #{ac_id}, #{checkin_day}, #{checkout_day}, #{status}, #{payment_code}, #{reg_date})
mapper.update: UPDATE booking SET email_id = #{email_id}, ro_type = #{ro_type}, ac_id = #{ac_id}, checkin_day = #{checkin_day}, checkout_day = #{checkout_day}, status = #{status}, payment_code = #{payment_code}, reg_date = #{reg_date} WHERE bo_num = #{bo_num}
mapper.select: select bo_num, room_num, checkin_day, checkout_day, tel, b.email_id, status, b.ac_id from booking b join accommodation a on b.ac_id = a.ac_id join member m on b.email_id = m.email_id where a.email_id like #{email_id}

select bo_num, room_num, checkin_day, room_price, checkout_day, b.email_id, b.ac_id, ac_title from booking b join accommodation a on b.ac_id = a.ac_id join room r on b.room_num = r.room_num join member m on b.email_id = m.email_id where b.email_id like #{email_id}
